oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lotz, Johann Albert
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Staircase
Lotz House, Staircase
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lotz designed and built this house, which is located across the street from the brick home of Fountain Branch Carter. Lotz, a skilled carpenter and German immigrant, created the interior detailing like this dramatically curved staircase. The oversized newell post may have been a later addition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Battlefields
Newels; Stairways
Walking a Fine Line
